summary: Comprehensive testing of Personal Finance Dashboard completed. Backend: 38/38 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All major features working correctly. Fixed 1 backend bug (missing start_date in auto-created debt).
action_items: Consider implementing /api/analytics/debt-ratios endpoint for dedicated debt ratio analytics
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: server.py line 556 - Debt model was missing required start_date field when auto-creating debt from Credit Card transactions
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Dashboard with 3 accounting equation cards (Harta, Utang, Kekayaan Bersih), Budget Planner with progress tracking, Financial Goals with contribution feature, Transactions CRUD with Credit Card auto-debt creation, Bills with mark-as-paid functionality, Debts management, Settings Categories and Preferences. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_finance_api.py covers all API endpoints.

dashboard.details: 3 accounting equation cards displayed correctly (HARTA/ASSETS, UTANG/LIABILITIES, KEKAYAAN BERSIH/NET WORTH)

budget_planner.details: Create budget, view budgets, progress tracking all working

financial_goals.details: Create goal, add savings/contribution, progress tracking all working

transactions.details: Add, view, delete transactions working. Credit Card transactions auto-create debt entries

bills.details: Add bill, mark as paid (creates transaction automatically) working

debts.details: Add, view, delete debt working. Debt-to-Asset ratio displayed

settings_categories.details: Add/delete categories, reset to default working

bug_fixed.description: Credit Card transaction was failing with 500 error due to missing start_date field when auto-creating Debt entry
